verses.verse: Now Jethro,<WH3503> the priest<WH3548> of Midian,<WH4080> Moses<WH4872>' father-in-law, heard<WH8085> of all<WH3605> that God<WH430> had done<WH6213> for Moses and for Israel<WH3478> His people,<WH5971> how<WH3588> the Lord<WH3068> had brought<WH3318> Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt.<WH4714>

"Now<WH6258> listen<WH8085> to me: I shall give<WH3289> you counsel,<WH3289> and God<WH430> be with you. You be the people's representative before<WH4136> God,<WH430> and you bring<WH935> the disputes<WH1697> to God,<WH430>
